item.title: Atlas 718 | The New World
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

It seems alright, your media looks pretty nice. Shame about the revision, I hate these sort of servers unfortunately. Any 718 cannot expect to pull too many players. I won’t play this but Goodluck.
